sn48.11:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim:
sn48.11:1.6: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti—
sn48.11:2.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro sammappadhane arabbha viriyam patilabhati—
sn48.11:3.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro satipatthane arabbha satim patilabhati—
sn48.11:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako vossaggarammanam karitva labhati samadhim, labhati cittassa ekaggatam—
sn48.11:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya—
